name: WSJ
text: Connecticut's health officials failed to develop a plan to protect nursing homes in the early days of the pandemic and were hampered by an outdated outbreak-monitoring system, according to an independent, state-funded report https://t.co/cSUfjmVL4T

name: WSJ
text: From @WSJopinion: To understand the unintended effects of the left’s hyper-focus on race, look no further than Yale’s affirmative-action practices, writes @gerardtbaker https://t.co/OQST9lo6sj
